org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans
Class InsertTranslator

java.lang.Object
  org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.QueryTranslator
      org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans.QueryAssembler
          org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.trans.InsertTranslator
Deprecated. since 1.2 Object InsertQuery is not needed anymore. It shouldn't be used directly anyway, but in cases where one might want to have access to it, InsertBatchQuery is a reasonable substitute. 

public class InsertTranslator
extends QueryAssembler

Class implements default translation mechanism of org.objectstyle.cayenne.query.InsertQuery objects to SQL INSERT statements. Note that in order for this query to execute successfully, ObjectId contained within InsertQuery must be fully initialized.

Author:
Andrei Adamchik

Method Detail

aliasForTable

public java.lang.String aliasForTable(DbEntity dbEnt)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from class: QueryAssembler
Returns a name that can be used as column alias. This can be one of the following:
  • an alias for this table, if it uses aliases
  • a fully qualified table name, if not.
CayenneRuntimeException is thrown if a table alias can not be created.

Specified by:
aliasForTable in class QueryAssembler
